abstract: At the Interactive Advertising Bureau’s Mixx conference, Google presented seven predictions for display advertising that the company thinks will happen by 2015.
snippet: At the Interactive Advertising Bureau’s Mixx conference, Google presented seven predictions for display advertising that the company thinks will happen by 2015.
lead_paragraph: Google might be late to the display advertising game, but it wants Madison Avenue to know that it will be ahead of the game in the future. At the Interactive Advertising Bureau’s Mixx conference in New York on Tuesday, Google made seven predictions for display advertising that the company thinks will happen by 2015.

headline.main: Google Predicts More Social, and Profitable, Display Ads

byline.original: By Tanzina Vega and Claire Cain Miller
